thread.title: Wonderful hotel in Kensington
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel in Kensington - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: hellobayo
title: Wonderful hotel in Kensington
text:
The welcome was good, check in was super quick! Staff all very courteous.
Decent sized room. I was given 2 double beds. Clean and good quality toiletries. 2 small bottles of small water provided free. Tea and small snacks included. The breakfast buffet was good and they also had siu mai on offer!
Slept well, the linen was crisp but towels weren't that fluffy. I can hear some road noise at times. I stayed on the 6th floor (top).
